articles.title: Built for now: Why brands need smarter, faster creative
articles.author: Chandra Sinnathamby
articles.summary: Adobe is using AI to accelerate content creation and improve marketing performance, achieving a 9% lift in ROI. The Coca-Cola Company partners with Adobe using Project Fizzion with a customized Adobe Firefly generative AI model, to train AI to generate on-brand content at scale while preserving creative intent, increasing speed to market. Adobe Express also saw a 35% increase in downloads by using AI to analyze individual asset attributes, then tying those features to performance data.

articles.title: 2026 Audi Q5 review: Quick drive
articles.author: James Wong
articles.summary: Audi Q5 features refined and efficient mild-hybrid engines. It offers good specification and is cheaper than rivals. The car has SQ5-lite looks as standard.

articles.title: Good News For Xbox Gamers, In Two Parts
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Xbox is introducing two new service updates. These updates aim to facilitate 'anywhere play' on the Xbox platform.

articles.title: CST Presents Five Innovative Solutions as Part of RegTech Project
articles.summary: CST presented five innovative solutions. These solutions are part of a RegTech project. The solutions are being introduced in Riyadh.

articles.title: 27 Amazon Pieces For Instant Outfit Success
articles.author: Jasmin Sandal
articles.summary: The content presents a variety of new clothing items and accessories, including a nonslip tube top, sleeveless jumpsuit, square-neck tank, tiered maxi skirt, baby tee, mesh long-sleeve, printed shorts, maxi slip dress, shoulder bag, linen pants, ballet flats, ribbed tank, wide-leg Levi's, tie-up shrug, bodysuit, palazzo pants, baggy overalls, off-shoulder top, pull-on jeans, knee-high boots, faux-leather leggings, pullover, sports tank, flared maxi skirt, button-up shirt, romper, and crewneck pullover. These items are available in various sizes and colors, with prices ranging from \$9.99 to \$69.99.

articles.title: TRIZ it up!
articles.author: Dr Tareq
articles.summary: IKEA uses Segmentation, a TRIZ tool, to create flat-pack furniture that's easy to transport and assemble. This involves breaking down a product into smaller parts to improve specific elements. The implementation of TRIZ principles enables businesses to come up with new products.

articles.title: 48 'Boring' Products Under $50 That'll Excite People 25+
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: Several new products have been introduced, including SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes, Monday Haircare Dry Shampoo, Nivea lightweight gel cream featuring Q10, and Medicube's Zero Pore Pads, Rael "Miracle Invisible Spot Cover" Pimple Patches. Qualify has also launched a chocolate brownie protein powder. These introductions span diverse categories like personal care, skincare, and nutrition, highlighting innovations and solutions from respective companies.

articles.title: Big News: You Can Now Shop For Recipes Directly In The Tasty App With Instacart
articles.author: Claudia Santos
articles.summary: Tasty has launched a new feature in its app that integrates with Instacart. This feature allows users to add ingredients from Tasty recipes directly to their Instacart shopping cart, streamlining the grocery shopping process. Users can customize ingredient selections and choose their preferred store through Instacart.

articles.title: 2027 DB Bryson Brown + Ala. A&M reactions
articles.author: Jacob Morris
articles.summary: Amazon curates recently launched products on its 'new releases page' within its online marketplace. The page highlights some of the most popular products that have gone on sale in the last week.

articles.title: What's on the surface matters. In fact, there's a whole science behind it.
articles.author: Chloe Jad
articles.summary: Surface Design Solutions, a Pittsburgh startup, provides software to optimize product design's surface finish and manage quality control for manufacturers. A $365,000 investment from the Richard King Mellon Foundation will help them refine the platform and address concerns about an aging workforce in manufacturing. The software aims to capture the expertise of experienced machinists and make it accessible to newer workers.

articles.title: Tasty App Now Offers Instacart Grocery Shopping
articles.author: Claudia Santos
articles.summary: Tasty app launched a new feature in collaboration with Instacart, allowing users to add ingredients from Tasty recipes directly to their Instacart shopping carts. This integration simplifies grocery shopping by automatically calculating ingredient quantities and providing price estimates, offering users convenience and customization options.

articles.title: 4 Skincare & Beauty Essentials You Need from Myntra's
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Cetaphil introduces Gentle Skin Hydrating Face Wash Cleanser with Vitamin B5 & Niacinamide. Lakmé launches Blush & Glow Strawberry Gel Face Wash enriched with strawberry extracts. Pond's releases Youthful Miracle Hexyl Retinol Complex Night Cream containing Hexyl Retinol Complex for overnight skin repair. Moha introduces Lip Butter – Nourishing Lip Care with cocoa butter, shea butter, and jojoba oil for dry lips.

articles.title: Score These 25 Underrated Things Before They Go Viral And Sell Out
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Sol de Janeiro introduced Cheirosa 71 shimmering body cream, designed to hydrate, soften, and even skin tone, providing a golden glow and a caramelized vanilla scent. Chasin' Rabbits launched an eye cream roller which dispenses a brightening cream and uses steel rollerballs for moisturizing and de-puffing.

articles.title: DreamCloud Mattress Sales: Save Up To 65% On Top-Rated Beds This Labor Day
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering discounts on new beds and bedding bundles, including mattresses, bases, and sheet sets, during their mattress sale event.

articles.title: Sunday forecast: Mostly sunny to clear skies
articles.author: Kathy Trafton
articles.summary: Amazon curates its hottest new product releases on its new releases page within the online marketplace for the last seven days.

articles.title: Gone Are Startup Fears Of Sharing Products Pre-Launch
articles.author: Michelle Greenwald
articles.summary: Robinhood accumulated 1 million sign-ups through a gamified waitlist program before launching its investing and trading platform. Gatorade trialed its GX sports bottle at high school soccer competitions and shared development progress of the GX ecosystem on social media before the international launch. Roam, a marketplace for international student moves, began with a waitlist and alpha-tested with early users before expanding its service to a wider audience.

articles.title: Huawei Unveils Next-Generation Innovations: Redefining the Future of Foldable Phones with Mate XST2
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Huawei has introduced the Mate XTS, a triple-fold smartphone with stylus compatibility and a Kirin 9020 processor. The company also unveiled the Mate XST2, featuring an improved hinge mechanism, ultra-thin glass, and enhanced software capabilities running on HarmonyOS. It is also expected to have a versatile multi-camera system, co-engineered with Leica.

articles.title: Melaka Becomes First State To Pioneer Direct Marketing Of Products By LPP Members At Petronas Station
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: The Farmers' Organisation Authority (LPP) collaborated with Petronas to launch a Farmer Product Marketing Programme. This program enables direct sales of fresh produce from LPP members at eight Petronas petrol stations in Melaka, with plans to expand to 32 stations. The initiative aims to provide new market opportunities for farmers and affordable produce for consumers.

articles.title: 28 Kitchen Products That Are So Handy, You'll Use Them Multiple Times A Day
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Ninja is launching the Crispi Air Fryer system. Emeril Lagasse introduces a dual zone air fryer. Dawn is launching Platinum Powerwash dish spray. Oxo is launching compact Brew Rapid Brewer. Ninja is launching Foodi 2-in-1 Flip Toaster. The Perfect Pot is launching as family-size pot. Caraway introduces a 12-piece ceramic, nonstick cookware set. Anyday is launching microwaveable cooking essentials. Mike's is launching Hot Honey.

articles.title: Read This: The CEO of that wannabe "Netflix Of AI" thing is extremely high on ...
articles.author: AV Club
articles.summary: Showrunner, a new streaming service built around generative AI content prompted by users, has launched. The service is currently housed within a Discord server.

articles.title: SAZGAR & GWM Unveil Pakistan's First Plug-in Hybrid SUV
articles.author: Yousuf Yaseen
articles.summary: SAZGAR Engineering Works, in collaboration with Great Wall Motors (GWM), launched the Haval H6 Plug-in Hybrid Electric Vehicle (PHEV) in Lahore. The H6 PHEV features a 1.5T engine + 19kWh battery, offering 360 HP & 760Nm torque, a 100km pure EV range, and the ability to accelerate from 0-100 km/h in 4.8 seconds. The company also presented a sneak peek at upcoming models like the GWM Tank 500 HEV and Cannon Alpha PHEV.

articles.title: 35 Products So Cool I Wish Someone Would Buy Them For All Of Us
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Dove introduced Coconut Milk & Sugar Lychee Body Wash, designed for sensitive skin. Vacation launched Orange Gelée SPF 30 Gel, a luxurious sunscreen with a French Riviera scent. L'Oreal Paris released Plump Ambition pH Lip Oil, a lip plumper with hyaluronic acid and tripeptides.

articles.title: Region's first 24/7 dry cleaning and laundry service kiosk opens in Centerville
articles.author: WHIO Staff
articles.summary: Fox Cleaners launched a new 24/7 dry cleaning and laundry service kiosk in Centerville, Ohio, designed to provide customers with more accessible dry cleaning and laundry services at any time of day. Customers can drop off and pick up items using a secure kiosk system and receive notifications via text.

articles.title: 42 Reviewer-Loved Things For Smarter Travel
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Munchkin offers a Sparrow travel stroller, lightweight and compact for easy transport, featuring a mesh headrest, sun shade, and bottom basket. Calpak has a duffel bag with a trendy puffy design and an interior shoe pocket. Hairbrella provides a satin-lined Hairbrella to protect hair from rain and humidity.

articles.title: 7 Best New Bath & Body Works Body Care Items Hitting Shelves This Month — Best Life
articles.author: Leah Barrett
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works is re-releasing several nostalgic fragrances and introducing new products for the fall season, with many items on sale for $5.95. The releases include the Country Apple Body Wash, Plumeria Fine Fragrance Mist, Caramel Apple Lip Gloss, Toasted S'mores Lip Mask, Sensitive Skin Milk Fragranced Shea Butter Cleansing Bar, Cucumber Melon Fine Fragrance Mist, and Autumn Drive Body Butter.

articles.title: Next Big Thing Products That Flopped
articles.author: Brian Galindo
articles.summary: Several companies launched innovative products and services that ultimately failed to meet expectations. Apple introduced the iPhone, which revolutionized communication, while Microsoft's Windows Phone and Zune failed to gain significant market share. Google's Google+ aimed to compete with Facebook but didn't succeed. Sony's MiniDisc lost out to rewritable CDs, and HD DVD lost the format war to Sony's Blu-ray. Facebook's MetaVerse also faced challenges after the company name change.

articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077' Finally Shows What DLSS Is Good For
articles.author: Slashdot
articles.summary: Nvidia's Deep Learning Super Sampling (DLSS) is a proprietary feature designed to render images at lower resolutions and display them as if they were rendered natively at a higher resolution. DLSS allows users to run games at maximum settings with stable framerates by solving the performance issues by improving the game's performance.

articles.title: Lidl's laundry gadget holds 3 loads of washing, folds away & means you don't need to hang wet clothes on radiators
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Vileda Mixer 3 Tower Airer, a laundry drying rack, in its middle aisle starting August 31st for £29.99. The airer offers 30m of drying space across six racks and includes holders for coat hangers and small laundry items, designed to save space with a foldable design and wheels for easy movement. It also comes with a three-year warranty.

articles.title: Sultan Center Unveils Flagship Al Hail Store, Elevating Premium Retail Experience in Oman
articles.author: Times News Service
articles.summary: Sultan Center has opened its new flagship store in Al Hail, Oman. This launch introduces a refreshed brand identity and an elevated shopping experience with a focus on exclusive imports, international finds, and high-quality local produce. The Al Hail store aims to provide a premium retail experience with innovative product curation and customer service.

articles.title: 30 Products That May Solve An Ongoing Problem
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: The article highlights several new products, including a WD-40 pen for precise application, Catrice "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener for concealing dark circles, and a self-cleaning broom and dustpan set. Additionally, it features First Aid Beauty's KP Bump Eraser Body Scrub Exfoliant and a DogBuddy pooper scooper with built-in bags for convenient waste disposal.

articles.title: The Best Moisturizers for Combination Skin Balance Hydration With Oil Control
articles.author: Iman Balagam
articles.summary: The article highlights several moisturizers for combination skin, including the new InnBeauty Project Recharge Gel Cream, which offers hydration and barrier repair. Other brands featured are Neutrogena, Medik8, Clearstem, Clinique, The Outset, EltaMD, Blue Lagoon Skincare, Belif, La Mer and Tata Harper, offering a variety of textures and key ingredients such as hyaluronic acid, ceramides, and peptides.

articles.title: Samsung Introduces Galaxy Buds3 FE With Iconic Design, Enhanced Sound and Galaxy AI Integration
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics launched the Galaxy Buds3 FE on September 5, featuring a Blade design, enhanced audio performance, and Galaxy AI capabilities. The earbuds have a larger speaker, improved Active Noise Cancelling, and Crystal Clear Call technology. They seamlessly integrate with Galaxy devices and offer intuitive controls for easy use.

articles.title: Tootoomoo launches Japanese sandos and pork banh mi in Sainsbury's
articles.author: Niamh Leonard-Bedwell
articles.summary: Tootoomoo has launched Miso Chicken and Egg & Chive sandos, along with a Sriracha Pulled Pork Banh Mi, into Sainsbury's stores. These sandwiches, inspired by Asian cuisine, are available for £4.50 and are included in Sainsbury's £5 premium lunchtime meal deal.

articles.title: Next's £29 shacket that's 'perfect for inbetween days when you don't need a coat'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Next is offering a £29 shacket, available in sizes 6 to 22 and three colors. The shacket is described as versatile and suitable for transitional weather, featuring a shirt collar, front pockets, and button fastening.

articles.title: Candy Brings Smart Living to Manila
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Candy, a global home appliance brand from Italy, is officially entering the Philippines market. The company will initially launch its water heater line, with plans to expand into other appliance categories like washing machines and refrigerators. This move aims to offer Filipino consumers a "Smart, Efficient, Simple" lifestyle experience.

articles.title: 12 Old School Beauty Products That Are Still Great
articles.author: Tessa Flores
articles.summary: Nivea offers a rich cream comparable to La Mer, formulated with glycerin and panthenol. Max Factor initially launched pancake foundation in 1935, with Lancôme's Dual Finish powder foundation serving as a similar product. Revlon offers a coral-orange lipstick as a substitute for the shade Marilyn Monroe wore. SoftSheen-Carson provides a conditioning shine gel for hair styling, and Dove offers a beauty bar that hydrates and cleanses.

articles.title: Best Hydrating & Long-Lasting Lip Glosses for a Glossy Finish
articles.summary: Bare Cosmetics launched Glossified Lip Dream Gloss, delivering intense shine with a smooth, non-sticky texture. Revolution introduced Relove Baby Gloss, a lightweight formula offering a high-shine, non-sticky finish. RENEE launched Hot Sauce Plumping Lip Gloss, combining ultra-glossy shine with a subtle plumping effect. Tint Cosmetics unveiled Rose Gold Lipgloss, offering a shimmering, glossy finish with a touch of rose gold sparkle.

articles.title: There's A Tablet To Clean So Many Things In Your Home
articles.author: Erica Kam
articles.summary: Active tablets for dishwashers eliminate odors and remove hard water buildup. M3 Naturals offers multi-use tablets for dentures, retainers, and water bottles, removing stains and bacteria. Other products mentioned include tablets for cleaning toilet bowls (limescale and rust), washing machines (residue and odor), espresso machines (grime and oils), coffee makers (descale), garbage disposals, ice machines, dishes, and as laundry detergent. Blueland tablets serve as laundry detergent, removing stains effectively.

articles.title: Huawei Teases New Mate XT Tri-Fold Phone with Pre-Orders Now Open—Is It Available in the US?
articles.author: Isaiah Richard
articles.summary: Huawei has introduced its second-generation Mate XT tri-fold smartphone, featuring a similar design to its predecessor but with a new white and gold color option. The phone retains the octagon frame on its camera module with a four-lens setup and book-style folding design.

articles.title: VIDEO: Mercedes-Benz G580 shows electric cars can have fun too
articles.author: Mark Jones
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz has launched the all-new, all-electric G580 with EQ Technology, including an Edition One model. The G580 features four electric motors, producing 432kW and 1 164Nm of torque, and offers off-road capabilities along with a range of approximately 350km on a full charge. The G580 with EQ Technology is priced at R3 823 457, while the Edition One model costs R4 647 456, inclusive of a five-year service and maintenance plan.

articles.title: Reviewer-Approved Mattresses Under $1,000
articles.author: Tessa Flores
articles.summary: Novilla offers a four-layer gel foam mattress. Wayfair's in-house brand introduces a plush hybrid mattress with six supportive layers. Vibe presents a cooling mattress with dual-layers of foam support. Cool Gel provides mattresses that come with two free pillows. Zinus offers a green tea- and charcoal-infused memory foam mattress. Serta features multiple mattresses, including the Perfect Sleeper, a classic quilt-top, and the Five Star mattress delivered in a box.

articles.title: Every Next perfume that smells similar to a luxury designer scent
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Next offers a range of scents priced affordably but with a luxurious fragrance.

articles.title: ZedMobile attracts 1 million subscribers in 12 months
articles.author: Chief Editor
org: Zambia Information and Communication Technology Authori
articles.summary: ZedMobile celebrated its first anniversary after achieving one million subscribers. The company partnered with Baicells to install satellites and aims to improve service delivery, particularly for low-income citizens. They also had a Win-a Car promotion where one customer won a brand new Suzuki Fronx.
